comments.body: Is this supposed to be a version or a branch?
Supposed to be a branch.  See also https://github.com/kubernetes/release/pull/14

comments.body: Did you mean this to be linky? 'Cuz it's raw text right now, which looks a little odd.

I meant for text - it is basically a link back to this same document - I
want it to be something people read, not click.
